Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ItemCast: Hotkeys to use an item in your inventory.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_Laning_BuyInitialItems: Buy All Your Suggested Starting Items From the Shop
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_MoveToAncient: Move VIEW to ancient (mouse the screen edge)
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_Train_Pudge: Learn to play Pudge, dawg.  Kill some bots in the bottom lane.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ItemsCombined: Your items have combined to form a %s1!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_AttackingIntro: You can attack enemy units by right-clicking them (you only need to right-click them once).
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_GoCreepingFollow: Since you ask, I spotted several neutral creep camps in the woods to the south. There's a fair bounty on their heads.  I'll show you where to start looking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LaneTip_3: Let your creeps lower the enemy creep's health and then move in to strike the last hit.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_AncientIntro: The Ancient is your team's most important building - if it's destroyed then your team loses. You must destroy The Dire team's Ancient to win the game.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_InspectShield: The Stout Shield is a passive item, so you need not activate it to gain its benefit. Mouse over the shield in your inventory to view its bonuses.\n\nPurchase the Healing Salve when you're ready to proceed. It can be found under the Consumables tab.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_Move: Hey, you! Dragon Knight, over here!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CourierHaste: Activate a speed boost on your courier when available.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTitle_WelcomeToDota: Basic Game Concepts and Controls Tutorial
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_MaidenIntro: You will be playing this match as Shadow Shaman, a master of voodoo magic. You are on The Radiant team, the enemy team is called The Dire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_BuyGauntlets: You're back! And with fresh coin from clearing those dens. It is my pleasure to offer you the repeat-customer price on these Gauntlets of Strength.\n\nRemember you can open the store by pressing %toggleshoppanel%.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_RecentEvent: Move the camera to the most recent event in the world.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_ReturnToShop: Return to the base to shop.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KillStreak_5_Ended: %s1 %s2 ended %s3's mega kill streak for %s4 gold!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportCancel: Woops!  Moving cancelled the channeled teleport.  This also consumes the Town Portal Scroll, so we'll need a new one.  Buy a new Town Portal Scroll from the shop and have the courier bring it to you.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_DefeatEnemyAncient: The enemy defenses are strong and you will need to attack with multiple waves of creeps to bring down each tower. Return to your base when your health is low or when you wish to buy new items.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_MoveToTopLane: Move your hero to the top lane.
Tokens.DOTA_StatTooltip_AgilityBonus: - Every 7 points increase armor by 1\n- Each point increases attack speed by 1\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierBuyItem1: All that gold. Time for upgrades! Let's upgrade your ring to a Ring of Basilius!\n\nOpen the shop with %toggleshoppanel% and purchase the Sage's Mask.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_Headdress: Headdress is useful early on to help you, your creeps and your lane mates to regenerate health.  The aura radius is only 500, so stay near an ally if they need some health.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ShrineKilledGood: A shrine was destroyed by The Dire!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_RingOfBas: Ring of Basilius is a powerful early game item for junglers and support heroes.  It gives a flat 0.65 mana regeneration, as well as 2 armor to all heroes and creeps in the radius, as well as providing the carrier with extra armor and damage.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RoundFour: Crystal Maiden's attack animation has a wind-up time and a slow moving projectile, making it difficult to predict when the hit will occur, making her difficult to last hit with.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CampFinish: You saved us! That's why you're a hero and we're just creeps. We'll hold this watchtower. Press on and find Keeper of the Light, so you can team up to fight Razor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_StashViewStash: Notice that the Boots of Speed have been placed in your stash. The stash shows you items you have stored back at the base.\n\nMouse over the Boots of Speed in your Stash to see what they'll do once you retrieve them.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RazorIntro: The enemy hero Razor has joined the battle for the Dire team. He is a master of lightning magic and has the powerful Plasma Field ability. He is going to attack along the top lane.
Tokens.DOTA_StatTooltip_IntelligenceBonus:
- Each point increases mana by 12
- Each point increases mana regen by 0.04
- Every 16 points increases spell damage by 1%
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ActivateGlyph: Activates the Glyph of Fortification to make your team's structures invulnerable for 5 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierRetrieve: Remember our courier? We can use him to retrieve items from the stash and bring them to us here. That way we don't need to return to base every time we buy something!\n\nClick the Deliver Items button near the bottom corner to continue.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerRetreat: If you find yourself under attack, try moving behind your creeps, and let them protect you.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_LastHit: Try to get as many last hits and denies as possible in the time limit.  Your score is a combination of last hits, denies, and how much damage you take.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_LevelIntro: When you gain a level you earn a point to spend on an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KilledRoshanBad: Roshan has been killed by the Dire! %s1 gold to each hero of The Dire!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatWheel: Opens Chat Wheel for easy communication of commonly used phrases.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_Minimap_Side_Subtitle: You can change this at any time in the Settings menu
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DropRateBonus: %s1 increases the Battle Points earned by all players in this match by %s2%!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_AttackTower: Towers have powerful attacks and a lot of hitpoints. Attack with your creeps and try to destroy the tower to complete this tutorial! Retreat if your creeps die and try to keep your health up!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_ShadowFiend: Farm as fast as you can!
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_ClearNeutral: Clear three Neutral Creep Camps
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_UltBegin: One more thing, you should reach level six to access your Ultimate ability, Elder Dragon Form to take on Razor. Let's find some creeps and level up!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_WinningIntro: Congratulations on completing the Basic Game Concepts and Controls tutorial! The next tutorial will run you through a full game - you even get to pick your hero!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LaneTip_1: You earn experience by being near an enemy that falls in battle. Only the last hit is required to earn gold.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RoundFive: Shadow Fiend is great at farming creeps rapidly with his good attack animation, high damage, and ability Shadowraze - see how quickly you can farm this lane.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_LowPriorityCompletedExplanatio: This game will not count as completed unless you stay until the end of the match (and there are players on both teams present).
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerHelp: Over here! Our tower is in danger! Tidehunter is coming and we can't hold him off. Help us! Help us!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_FountainIntro: The fountain can quickly replenish your health and mana. It also revives you if you die in combat. Let's look at some other important buildings around.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_ChooseYourHero: Shadow Shaman is a great hero to learn with. He has a ranged attack so you can attack safely from the back ranks. His Serpent Wards ability is especially good for destroying towers. You can complete this tutorial with any hero, though.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_MatchWillNotBeScoredRanked: No stats will be recorded for this match.  Matchmaking rating (MMR) will not be updated.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RoundOne: Sniper has a ranged attack with no projectile, so the hit occurs very quickly.  However, he has low base damage, so timing is important.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_UseDragonTail: Hit your %dota_ability_execute 1% key to start casting Dragon Tail, and then Left Click on an enemy to stun them!
Tokens.DOTA_KillcamDamage_Alert_Attacks: I took %s1 attack damage from %s2<font color='%s3'>%s4</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_UpgradeComplete: We should press on and find more places to earn experience.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_StartExplanation3:
Watch the health of the enemy creeps, and only hit them when their health is low.

Try to get 15 last hits in the middle lane.

Don't forget to buy some items!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierComplete: It looked like Tidehunter was low on health.  Perhaps there's a way you can fend him off once and for all.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CampInvade: More creeps!  Quick, cast Breathe Fire on them!  Burn them!  Burn them!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_CloseShop: To close the shop, you can left-click the X at the top left, left-click anywhere outside the shop menu, or press the button near your inventory. The shop also automatically closes when you walk out of its purchase area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_SecretGo: There's a Secret Shop over there! Let's check it out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_StashBuyBoots: We earned a bit of gold off of those creeps. Did you know you can buy items when not at a shop? When purchased, they'll be held for you in your stash so you can pick them up later.\n\nOpen the shop with %toggleshoppanel% and buy the Boots of Speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_End: Congratulations! You've learned about last hits and denies. Keep practicing, and victory will surely follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerAbandonedAFK: %s1 has been removed from the game due to inactivity and will be assessed with an abandon.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTitle_UseItemIntro: Using the Town Portal Scroll to Teleport
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DisconnectWaitForReconnect: %s1 has disconnected from the game. Please wait for them to reconnect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitComplete: Beautiful! Your Circlet and Gauntlets have been combined to create the upgraded Bracer, which will provide greater attributes, and free up space in your inventory.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_InTheBag: %s1 has predicted their team will win!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitBracer: Surely you'll need more before you face Razor though. I'd recommend some Bracers.\n\nBracers are an Upgraded Item, which requires one or more items and a Recipe. Return when you've earned 210 gold and I'll show you what you need to do.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_StashGo: The base isn't far from here, let's retrieve your items!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_AbilityIntro: You can see what each ability does by hovering the mouse over its icon. Spend points to earn levels in abilities by clicking on the yellow bar beneath their icon. Level up your Ether Shock ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatGlobal: Send a message to everyone in your current game. (Will add a SHIFT modifier to the Chat Team hotkey)
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_Attack: Attack this Dire creep by right clicking on him. Kill him! Kill him!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_YouPaused: You paused the game, you have %s1 pauses remaining.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportChannel: With the courier on its way, there's something you need to know about teleporting. Town Portal Scroll is a channeled spell, meaning you need to stand still while using it. If you move, it will cancel the cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_MoveCamHow: You can move the camera in several ways:\n- Move your mouse to the edge of the screen.\n- By holding down your Middle Mouse button and dragging.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Autocast: Toggle to automatically cast an ability when it is ready.  Applies to a limited number of abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_New_KillStreak_5: %s1 %s2 is on a mega kill streak
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledBadNearby: %s1 was just killed by The Radiant! %s2 gold is distributed among all Radiant heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledAssist: %s1 was just killed! %s2 gold is split among assists:
Tokens.DOTA_InspectHeroInWorld_Error_EnemySelec: Showcase View available for friendly units only
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_RingUpgraded: Nice! The Sage's Mask combined with your Ring of Protection to create Ring of Basilius. This item can boost the armor of allied creeps. For now, let's turn it off. Hit %!item_ring_of_basilius% to toggle the aura off.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_WillPurchaseAlert_OutOfStock: I will purchase %s1 <font color='%s2'>%s3</font> ( out of stock %s4 )
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_SupportItems_Buckler: Give your friendly heroes the armor bonus!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportWrongLoc: The tower is represented by a green square. Try using the Town Portal Scroll again and left-click near the green square.\n\nYou can usually teleport to any building but right now we should get close to where we last saw Tidehunter.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_UseItemIntro: To use the Town Portal Scroll, left-click it then left-click your desired destination in the mini-map. Teleport is a channeling spell, so be careful not to interrupt it by giving your hero another command while you cast it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_Camp: Dragon Knight, follow us to the watchtower. Protect us! There may be more enemy creeps on the way.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierDeploy: The Courier, like a Salve, is an active item and must be deployed before you can use it.\n\nDeploy the Courier by hitting %!item_courier%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitGold190: You've earned enough gold to buy the Bracers! Let us seek out the merchant and make use of your coin.
Tokens.DOTA_New_Player_Key_Config: Select Initial Configuration (You can modify settings at any time)
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Pause: Pause and Unpause a game in progress.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_FollowCreeps: Follow your creeps to the front line.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_WillPurchaseAlert_Suggestion: I think someone should purchase %s1 <font color='%s2'>%s3</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_KillTideComplete: Pow!  You did it! He won't be bothering us anymore.  Our base is now safe!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_Frostivus_Abandon_Reminder: The standard abandonment and AFK rules apply to Wraith-Night matches!  Abandoning Wraith-Night games may lead to punishment by placement in the low-priority queue.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ChargesExhausted: You have used the last charge on your item '%s1'.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DisconnectTimeRemainingPlural: %s1 has %s2 minutes left to reconnect.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_CameraIntro: You can scroll your view by moving the mouse to the edge of the screen. Let's look to the northeast at your team's Ancient.
Tokens.DOTA_XP_Alert_Enemy_Capped: Enemy <font color='%s1'>%s2</font> is at max level!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_Minimap_Side_Title: On which side of the HUD would you expect to see the minimap?
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_CastIntro: The Ether Shock ability deals magical damage. It costs you mana every time you use it. Click the ability icon then left-click where you'd like to cast it.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_Urn2: When Soul Release is used, it drains a charge from Urn of Shadows.  If it is used on an ally, it will heal them for 400 HP over the course of 8 seconds.  If the unit takes tower damage or damage from a player-controlled unit, the heal is lost, so be careful to use the heal only in situations when this won't happen.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_AutoBuyIntro: Auto-buy will purchase items appropriate for your character. You will auto pick up your items when you return to the fountain. If you get a message to go to the secret shop check the minimap for the location. Head out when ready.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_SafeToLeave: This game is now safe to leave.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_CantUnpauseTeam: You can not resume the game on this team yet.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_NoPausesLeft: You have no remaining pauses left.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerLeftAFK: %s1 has been removed from the game due to inactivity.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_TowerKilledBad: A tower was destroyed by The Radiant!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_ShopAttract: Ah, Dragon Knight! A true hero!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_LaningIntro: A wave of Radiant creeps is about to spawn. Follow them into combat to provide ranged support. Try not to get hit - you are too important to take damage! When a wave of creeps dies, it's wise to back off to regroup with the next creep wave.
Tokens.DOTA_ReactiveHintBody_Death: When you die you will respawn at your fountain. The time to respawn gets higher as you level so it's imperative that you try to NEVER DIE. If you are low on health then return to the fountain to heal.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DisconnectLimitedHero: %s1 has disconnected from the game.  Their hero will be replaced by a bot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_BuyShield: Right click on the Stout Shield to purchase it. The Stout Shield can be found under the Armaments tab.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ActionItemReason_GamemodeRestr: the item is not usable in this game mode
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_BountiesIntro: When you get the killing blow on a unit or structure you get a bounty. Attack enemy units that are low on health and try to get the bounty.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_NoBattlePoints_LowPriority: You will not receive Experience Trophy Progress because you are in the Low Priority Punishment Pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_MapIntro: Here's a map with the tower location!
Tokens.DOTA_ReactiveHintBody_TowerDamage: Towers do A LOT of damage - if you take even a few hits from them you might need to return to the fountain and heal. It's better to fight near the tower only when your creeps are already attacking it.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerAbandonedDisconnectedToo: %s1 has been disconnected for too long and will be assessed with an abandon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportBuy: Now you need a Town Portal Scroll from the shop.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitCirclet: Welcome back! Buy the Circlet to further boost your attributes. Why don't you slip into it? Move your mouse over the attributes next to your portrait to see the benefits of your purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_BuyBack: %s1 just bought back into the game!
Tokens.DOTA_HPMana_Alert_Enemy_Dead: Enemy <font color='%s1'>%s2</font> will respawn in %s3 seconds!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledGeneric: %s1 was just killed by a Neutral Creep!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_SuperCreepsGood: All of the Dire Barracks have fallen. The Radiant now have Mega creeps!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportBlock: A rock slide blocked our way back. Suspicious. We're not completely stranded though. We can teleport our way out of here! To do that we'll need to upgrade the courier to a Flying Courier. Upgrade the courier through the shop.
Tokens.GC_reconnecting: Restoring connection to the Dota 2 network...
Tokens.DOTA_XP_Alert_Self: I need <font color='#DAAF01'>%s1 XP</font> to reach <font color='#DAAF01'>Level %s2</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_DenyExplanation1: Denying your friendly creeps is a way to keep your opponents from earning gold.\n\nTo deny a creep, you need to deal the killing blow to a friendly creep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_AreaAssign: You showed them! Go ahead and level up Shrapnel when you have a chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_NoBattlePoints_WrongLobby: Experience Trophy Progress will not be awarded for this match because it is a practice lobby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TangoUse: You can use tangoes to heal. Hit %!item_tango% and then left click on a tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_CanQuitWithoutAbandon: Players may now leave this match without being assessed with an abandon.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_CombatIntro: There is combat up ahead. Remember to be careful and avoid taking damage.
Tokens.DOTA_XP_Alert_Ally: <font color='%s1'>%s2</font> needs <font color='#DAAF01'>%s3 XP</font> to reach <font color='#DAAF01'>Level %s4</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_KillTide: Hopefully, Tidehunter is still lurking.  Follow me to where we last spotted him, and maybe we can get the jump on him!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_WillPurchaseAlert_GoldRemainin: I will purchase %s1 <font color='%s2'>%s3</font> ( %s4 gold away )
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_PurchaseQuickbuy: Purchase the next item in your Quickbuy area  if you can afford it.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_Mid1v1Tier1Tutorial: You will play Sniper versus a Dragon Knight enemy bot. Defend your mid-tier1 tower while destroying the enemy's mid-tier1 tower.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PickedUpAegis: %s1 picked up Aegis of the Immortal!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledGoodNearby: %s1 was just killed by The Dire! %s2 gold is distributed among all Dire heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Halloween_MidGame_Dire: The Dire have collected the most candy
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_FrostivusShiningBoosterActive: %s1 increases the <font color='#12E4FF'>Shining Fragments</font> earned by all players in this game by <font color='#12E4FF'>10%</font>!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerLevelAny: You've gained another level.  Go ahead and level up and choose a skill.  Read the tool tips to learn what each one does and pick one.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_SelectAll: Select all units under your control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_LastHits2: Don't constantly attack.\n\nCancel your attacks by moving, and then strike when the creep's health is low.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_LastHits3: You can also use %dota_stop% to halt your attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Cast: Hotkeys to cast a Hero ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CampLevel: Hey, you gained a level! You're getting even stronger.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_UltLevel: That'll do it! Level up and choose your Ultimate ability, Elder Dragon Form.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_LearnStats: Add two points to each of your stats when you have skillpoints to spend.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroMove: Move to a location, or follow a unit without attacking it.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_Laning_SelectInitialAbility: Select an Initial Ability
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_BridgeSmoke: Hey Sniper, I spotted something at the bridge nearby.  Let's check it out.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_Ranked_Reminder: Abandonment is treated more severely in ranked matches.  Matchmaking rating (MMR) will be updated for any match that progresses past first blood.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted3: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Slime!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CampUseBreath: Hit your %dota_ability_execute 0% key to starting casting Breathe Fire, and then Left Click on an enemy to target it!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ActionItemReason_HornBlown: the item must be used before the game start horn has sounded
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SpendGold: Let's return to the base to spend your hard-earned gold. Right-click on your team's base in the bottom left of the mini-map to move there.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_IntroRazor: I bring the spark of death!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_MatchWillNotBeScoredRankedNetw: Poor network conditions have been detected.  No stats will be recorded for this match.  Matchmaking rating (MMR) will not be updated.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_Urn: Urn of Shadows is a dynamic item that can be used in many ways.  Passively, it grants some strength and mana regeneration, but the Soul Release ability is more important.  Whenever an enemy hero dies around an Urn carrier, that Urn will gain 2 Soul Release charges.
Tokens.DOTA_InspectHeroInWorld_Error_FreeCamOnl: Showcase View available in Free Camera only
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TangoRestore: Using a tango will increase the rate at which your health is restored for a short period.\n\nLet's go!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KillStreak_8_Ended: %s1 %s2 ended %s3's monster kill streak for %s4 gold!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_GrabStashItems: Transfer all items from your Stash to your Hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted1: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Chrome!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_MovingYourCharacter: You can move your character by right-clicking where you want to go. Your team fountain is directly below you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_MapExplain: The mini map contains a lot of useful information. You'll be able to see your position, as well as the location of towers and creeps. It'll even show where your enemies are, provided allied forces have vision of them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_RangedCreep: Remember, your ranged weapon allows you to take cover behind your creeps and do damage from a safe distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitReminder: Remember it's the killing blow that matters. You only earn gold by striking the Last Hit on a creep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitAttack: Last hit! Remember to time your swings! Moving in midswing to cancel an attack is a good way of timing a Last Hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledGoodNearbySingle: %s1 was just killed by The Dire! %s2 gold is distributed among all Dire heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_BuyFromShop: You can use the gold you earn to buy items from the shop.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RankedGameStillScoredleaversGe: This match will be scored, and matchmaking rating (MMR) will be updated.  Leavers will be scored as losers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_BuyClarity: Buy a Clarity potion too which will allow you to regenerate mana quickly for a period of time.\n\nLike with the Healing Salve, the regeneration will stop if you take damage before its work is done.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledGood: %s1 was just killed by The Dire! %s2 gold is distributed among all Dire heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_NoBattlePoints_CheatsEnabled: Experience Trophy Progress will not be awarded for this match because cheats are enabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_AreaUse: Sniper! Use Shrapnel by hitting %dota_ability_execute 0% and left-click to cast it on these guys!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_Warning: Dragon Knight! Our old enemy Razor is attacking our outposts. Keeper of the Light already went after him. He said to send you along when you showed up.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TangoIntro: Oh, you're a bit low on health. Here, take these Tangoes. I've got extras.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_VictoryPredictionStreak: %s1 has a streak of %s2 successfully predicted wins.
Tokens.GC_noconnection: Not connected to the Dota 2 network.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierBuy: While you're here, pick up a Courier as well. Couriers are great for bringing items to you while in the field, but more on that later.\n\nPurchase a Courier to continue.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_Denies: Keep your opponent from getting gold and experience by killing friendly creeps.\n\nPress %mc_attack% then left-click on a friendly creep with low health.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Group: Select a preset control group of units. To define a control group, select the desired units and holding CTRL + one of these group hotkeys.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportCenter: Center the view on yourself by double tapping %+dota_camera_follow% or by left-clicking the minimap.\n\nI better get a move on!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerExplain: Good thing we had this tower helping to defend against the enemy. Towers are important to defense.\n\nIf today's been any indication, there's likely more creeps sneaking around.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_ViewToHero: Move your view back (click your portrait)
Tokens.DOTA_HPMana_Alert_Self: I have <font color='#00FF00'>%s1% HP</font>  <font color='#257FF6'>%s2% Mana</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_StashBuyRing: While we're at it, a little armor would be nice, so why not buy a Ring of Protection. Armor reduces damage from attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_AD_BanCount: <font color='#FFFFFF'>%s1</font> heroes have been randomly selected and Banned.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ScreenshotSettings: Take a screenshot of the current game view.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_SuperCreepsBad: All of the Radiant Barracks have fallen. The Dire now have Mega creeps!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_LastHits1: Deal the killing blow to the enemy.\nStay safe behind your creeps, then strike at the right moment.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CameraGrip: Hold down and drag on the world to move the camera. Also bound to the middle mouse button.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_PostPotion: Be careful. If you take damage while that salve works its magic, the healing will come to an end.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CreepingAllDead: Well done!  You've earned gold aplenty and destroyed the threat.  Let's return to the merchant and see about that new item.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_NoBattlePoints_Bots: Experience Trophy Progress will not be awarded for this match because it is against bots.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_SecretShop: Go to the secret shop to get a %s1
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems: Learn in-depth mechanics of Support items!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_BarracksIntro: Each lane has two barracks where your team's foot soldiers, known as creeps, spawn at regular intervals. Creeps move to the enemy base and attack enemy units and buildings in their path -- you cannot control them!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_DenyExplanation3: Just like before, focus on staying safe and hitting at the right moment.\n\nTry to deny 3 friendly creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_BridgeOut: Tidehunter got away. He was out of range of your normal attacks but your ultimate ability has much longer range. We'll need more experience...\n\nOh! This way!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_VictoryPredictionSingleUserCon: You have predicted your team will win!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Legacy: Use all hotkeys associated with Dota 1.  Ability hotkeys will vary per Hero.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SpawningBots: For this lesson you will be playing against two computer-controlled enemies and you will have one computer player on your team. Try to push in the middle lane to the Dire base and kill their Ancient.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_AttackWave: More creeps! Lend your sword, Dragon Knight!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KilledRoshanGood: Roshan has been killed by the Radiant! %s1 gold to each hero of The Radiant!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KillStreak_7_Ended: %s1 %s2 ended %s3's wicked sick streak for %s4 gold!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_StartExplanation2: While last hitting, it is important to stay safe behind your friendly creep line.\n\nYou'll want to avoid taking damage if you don't need to.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_MoveHow: Right Click to move where you want to go. Move to the highlighted location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportUse: You can teleport to any building, but we should head to the tower outside the base where we last saw Tidehunter.\n\nUse the Town Portal Scroll by hitting %!item_tpscroll% and then left-click the tower on the minimap.
Tokens.DOTA_HPMana_Alert_Enemy: Enemy <font color='%s1'>%s2</font> has <font color='#FA3009'>%s3% HP</font>  <font color='#257FF6'>%s4% Mana</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_AbandonedRankedBeforeFirstBloo: When a player abandons a ranked game before first blood, their entire party receives a loss, even though stats are not otherwise recorded.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_ViewHeroIntro: You can snap your view back to your hero by clicking your portrait or double tapping F1. Do that now to return your view to your hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted2: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Dry!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledAssistNearbySingle: %s1 was just killed! %s4 gold is split among assists:
Tokens.DOTA_StatTooltip_StrengthBonus: - Each point increases hit points by 20\n- Each point increases hit point regen by 0.03\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_KeeperIntro: Ah, now if it isn't my old friend Dragon Knight! We've had ourselves a bit of a dust-up with invading creeps, so if you'll lend us your sword arm, I'll keep you supplied in mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted4: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Oil!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_StashRetrieve: Ahh, welcome back Sniper. I've a couple items set aside for you here in your stash. Whenever you're inside the base you can pick up your items.\n\nHit the Grab All button on the stash to transfer any items in your stash to your inventory.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DisconnectTimeRemaining: %s1 has %s2 minute left to reconnect.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroTaunt: Use your Hero Taunt.  Available as an equippable item.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerThanks: Wow, that was close. Thanks, Sniper. Tidehunter was giving us a tough time, but it looks like he was low on health, and you scared him off.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_UseClarity: Now use the Clarity and regain your mana. Instead of clicking on it, try hitting %!item_clarity% to use it - each inventory slot has a key assigned to it. Hitting %!item_clarity% twice will immediately use it on yourself.\n\nAfter using it, you'll see the regeneration buff icon above your healthbar. You can mouse over a buff icon to see a description of the effects.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledAssistNearby: %s1 was just killed! %s4 gold is split among assists:
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_MapIntro: There is a mini-map on the lower left corner of your screen. Your base (in green) is in the bottom left corner and the enemy base (in red) is in the top right.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_LaneIntro: There are three main lanes towards the enemy base. Let's move to the top one.
Tokens.dota_chatwheel_message_Barracks_then_Bac: Destroy the barracks, then get back
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledBad: %s1 was just killed by The Radiant! %s2 gold is distributed among all Radiant heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_AD_BanCount1: <font color='#FFFFFF'>%s1</font> hero has been randomly selected and Banned.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_InspectHeroInWorld: View a unit from an up-close perspective.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitRecipeBuy: The items required for the Bracers show up near the bottom of the shop window. You already have two of them so all you need is the Recipe which can be purchased automatically by right-clicking the Bracer. You can also buy the recipe directly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitGold185: Well done, you've earned enough gold for the Circlet. Let's return to the merchant, shall we?
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_GetALevel: Gain a level by helping to kill enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_FindingYourHero: If you lose track of your hero, you can double-tap F1 or click on your hero's portrait to center the camera on it.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerLeftLimitedHero: %s1 left the game.  Their hero will be replaced by a bot.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_PrepareForBattle: When you spawn into a game you have one ability point and 603 gold to buy items. Spend the point to learn an ability. For this lesson we have enabled auto-buy so you don't need to worry about the store.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatVoice: Use your microphone to communicate with voice chat.
Tokens.DOTA_CustomGame_LaunchError: Failed to launch a custom game
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_Pudge_Goal: Gank the two enemy heroes in the bottom lane.  Try to get 5 hero kills without dying more than 3 times.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_BoughtGauntlets: I have more fine items for you, Sir knight. But as before, you will need more gold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LaneTip_2: Stay behind your creeps and let them engage the enemy first.  This is a good way to avoid damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitRecipe: Ah, the knight returns! Keep in mind that some items are crafted in combination. In this case, you own the Circlet and Gauntlets which can be crafted into Bracers.\n\nOpen the shop and click Upgrades. Left-click on the Bracers to display all the required items to craft the bracer.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_StayInLane: Since you earn experience and gold from defeating enemy units it's important to spend time in the lane at the beginning of the game. Return to your lane to get back into combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RecruitmentDropRateBonus: %s1 is earning Battle Points at a 50% increased rate due to playing with recruits or their recruiter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_SecretExplain: Oh! A customer! The Secret Shop stocks items you can't buy at the base. Why not try upgrading your Boots of Speed to Arcane Boots? To do so you'll need an Energy Booster.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_Laning_Attack: Destroy the Enemy Mid-Lane Tower
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_DragonTail: Ah, you're level five! Choose your Dragon Tail skill, and try it out on some creeps. It's a short ranged Stun that'll make it easy for you to smite enemy Heroes.
Tokens.SteamClientOutOfDate: Steam client missing or out of date
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_TowerKilledGood: A tower was destroyed by The Dire!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ItemQuickcast: A Quickcast item will trigger as soon as the hotkey is pressed at the current location of the mouse cursor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_ShopOpen: Greetings, my friend, and welcome to my shop. Hit %toggleshoppanel% to open and close the shop menu.\n\nAllow me to make a few recommendations. For you, I suggest a Healing Salve and perhaps, hmm, yes...a Stout Shield. I believe you have just enough gold.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_New_KillStreak_10: %s1 %s2 is beyond GODLIKE, someone kill them!!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_WelcomeToDota: This tutorial will introduce you to the world of Dota and show you how to control your hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_RazorBegin: I smell a spark in the air...Razor is coming! Use your Elder Dragon Form to prepare for the fight!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ControlGroupCyclePr: Cycle backwards through each unit of a selected group.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_UpgradeBoots: Just like that, you've crafted yourself Arcane Boots by combining two items! While not the perfect item for every hero, right now, these look good on you.\n\nArcane Boots are an active item, try it out now by pressing %!item_arcane_boots%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_UsePotion: Healing Salves are Active Items, meaning they must be activated in order to use them. Left-click on the Salve in your inventory to get a targeting cursor, then left-click on yourself to apply it.\n\nTry it now to see how it works.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_MoveCam: We need your help!  Across the bridge! Head north, and follow the path.
Tokens.DOTA_Halloween_MidGame_Radiant: The Radiant have collected the most candy
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_Laning_Defend: Defend Your Mid-Lane Tower
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted6: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Potion!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RoundTwo: Anti-Mage has a very quick attack animation and fast attack rate - melee heroes are generally easier to last hit with.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_FindKeeper: Find Keeper of the Light
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CreepLevel: You've earned another level! Click the LEVEL UP button and select Dragon Blood. This ability increases your armor, which reduces damage done by enemy attacks, and improves your health regeneration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_GoldEarned: That's gold aplenty, Dragon Knight!  Return to the merchant and let's put it to good use.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_EarnMoney3: Earn 210 Gold and Buy Bracers
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_UseTPScroll: Use your Town Portal Scroll to teleport.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_LearnAbility: Enter Learn Ability mode when you have skillpoints to spend.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CourierDeliver: Have the Courier deliver the items from your stash to you.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerLeftDisconnectedTooLong: %s1 has been disconnected for too long and has been removed from the game.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_LevelUlt: Well done! Level up and learn Assassinate when you have a chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_DefendCamp: Defend the Watchtower Using Breathe Fire
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitAgain: Once more to battle, Dragon Knight!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_Rune_Bottle_DoubleDamage: %s1 has bottled a <font color='#82CAFF'>Double Damage</font> rune.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroAttack: Move to a location but attack any enemy unit you see on the way / Attack a friendly unit if it's deniable.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_ExpIntro: When an enemy unit dies all nearby heroes on your team share the experience. Try to get enough experience to gain a level.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitIntro: There's a Circlet in the shop to further boost your attributes. I spotted a battle to the west where we can earn enough gold to purchase that Circlet.
Tokens.DOTA_Quest_EarnMoney2: Earn 165 Gold and Buy a Circlet
Tokens.dota_chatwheel_message_Tower_then_Back: Destroy the tower, then get back
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_PullBegin: Spotted more here!\n\nTry shooting them once to get their attention and pull them towards your creeps by running back here. Allow your creeps to help take them out!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_RingOfBas: The item can be toggled. When turned off, the aura won't give your friendly creeps the bonus armor.  Turn it on when you want to make summoned units more powerful or push a lane.  The ring's aura will still affect allied heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_RangedLevelTwo: There's probably more where he came from. Explore a bit and see what turns up. The more you fight, the more experience you'll earn to reach level two.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ShrineKilledBad: A shrine was destroyed by The Radiant!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CreepLevelForce: Don't forget to level up!\n\nClick the LEVEL UP button and select Dragon Blood. This skill improves health regeneration and armor reducing damage done by the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_PlayerKilledBadNearbySingle: %s1 was just killed by The Radiant! %s2 gold is distributed among all Radiant heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_PriorityUnit: Sets a unit as a priotiry unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Quickcast: A Quickcast ability will trigger as soon as the hotkey is pressed at the current location of the mouse cursor.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_Bot_SuggestGlyph: I think we should use Glyph
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_DenyExplanation2: You can force attack friendly creeps whose health is below half.\n\nTo do so, press %mc_attack% to force attack, then left-click on the creep.
Tokens.DOTA_RespawnOutOfLives: Cannot respawn, team is out of lives
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_LevelExperience: The ring's aura no longer affects friendly creeps but it still provides a bonus to you.\n\nTime to find a few more creeps and earn that experience to reach level six.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_TeleportIntro: Your Blades of Attack provide a passive damage bonus, whereas the Town Portal Scroll must be activated. Using a Town Portal Scroll allows you to teleport to any of your team's buildings. This is critical to save precious time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_LastHit_StartExplanation1: Time to focus on earning gold! One way to do that is by striking the killing blow on the enemy. If you're the one to last hit them, you'll earn the bounty.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_LastHitHowTo: In battle, you need to strike the Last Hit on a creep to earn gold. Too early or too late, and you get nothing!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted5: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Electrified!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_SupportItems_Buckler: Buckler is a useful defensive item.  It passively grants some armor and stats, while it's active ability will give friendly units around you +2 bonus armor. This can be helpful when attacking or defending towers, or in teamfights.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_MoveCamHowNoEdge: You can move the camera in several ways:\n- With the %+forward% %+moveleft% %back% %+moveright% keys.\n- By holding down your Middle Mouse button and dragging.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_RazorDead: Well, done, noble Knight.  You've defeated Razor!
Tokens.DOTA_HPMana_Alert_Glyph_Cooldown: Glyph of Fortification %s1On Cooldown ( %s2 seconds remain )
Tokens.Chat_Wheel_Customize: Customize which phrases appear on the Chat Wheel
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_CampLevelHint: Click the LEVEL UP button above your portrait and select your first ability, Breathe Fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_LevelUp: Low health? Your ultimate ability, Assassinate, is perfect as it does a lot of damage! Heroes learn their ultimate ability at level six. We'll need more experience though. Lead the way northeast. Better leave the courier here, we don't need the little guy just yet.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_CoopLowPriorityNoPassiveRemind: You will not receive credit for playing through a low-priority match in Co-op Bot mode if you are playing on passive difficulty.  To receive credit, please play on easy difficulty or greater.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_CourierTravel: The courier is off!  The mask was automatically transferred from your stash onto the courier and is on its way.  You can check on the status of the courier by looking at the mini map.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_MatchWillNotBeScoredNetwork: Poor network conditions have been detected.  No stats will be recorded for this match.  Matchmaking rating (MMR) will not be updated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_KillTideHow: Time to get to work. Use Assassinate by pressing %dota_ability_execute 5% and then clicking on Tidehunter.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_KillStreak_10_Ended: %s1 %s2 ended %s3's beyond GODLIKE streak for %s4 gold!
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_RoundThree: Mirana has a good attack animation and projectile speed but lower damage, making her of moderate difficulty.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_QuestFailure: You failed to completed the quest.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_RiverPainted7: %s1 has painted the river with River vial: Blood!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TeleportCourier: Now have the courier bring it to you using the Deliver Items button.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_BuyAbility: Spend an ability point to learn Ether Shock.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_ItemAutoPurchased: The item %s1 has been purchased for you!
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_SelectAllOthers: Select all other units you control. (Your Hero will not be selected.)
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_AbandonLimitedHeroExplanation: There are no punishments for leaving Limited Heroes mode games, but abandoning games in all other game modes may lead to punishment by placement in the low-priority queue.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_BuyFromShop2: Left-click on the shop to view the items for sale. Double-click on the Town Portal Scroll and the Blades of Attack to buy them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_AreaLearn: Shrapnel is an Area of Effect ability. It will do damage to enemies caught within its radius.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialBody_NewItems: You have been given a few items to help you in battle. You have tangoes with an ABILITY to eat a tree to gain health. You also have a perseverance that PASSIVELY increases your regeneration.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_AegisStolen: %s1 snatched the Aegis of the Immortal!
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_TowerLevel: During the fray you earned another level. Level up your Headshot to give yourself a chance to stop your enemy in their tracks.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_PurchaseSticky: Purchase the item that is in the Sticky area if you can afford it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_Intro: Sniper! I found you! The base is in danger, and we need your help. Tidehunter was spotted with some creeps trying to wear down our defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_TutorialTask_BuyTPScroll: Buy two items from the shop.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ControlGroupCycle: Cycle through each unit of a selected group. Holding CTRL while pressing this button will cycle in reverse.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroHold: Interrupt your current action and hold your position.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_Experience_Question: How familiar are you with Real-Time Strategy games?
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Console: Open the console. (For advanced users only)
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_CoopBattlePointsRules: The standard abandonment and AFK rules apply to Co-op Bot games!  Experience Trophy Progress and end-of-game drops have also been re-enabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_MatchWillNotBeScored: No stats will be recorded for this match.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M2_AreaFriendly: Don't worry, Shrapnel won't hurt allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tutorial_M1_GoCreeping: Well done, Sir Knight. Now I have another item in mind for the battle ahead, but you'll need to earn a bit more gold first. Roquelaire, where might our knightly friend find some lucrative work for his sword?
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_DeniedAegis: %s1 denied the Aegis of the Immortal!!
Tokens.DOTA_Chat_New_KillStreak_8: %s1 %s2 is on a monster kill streak
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatTeam: Send a message to everyone on your team.
Tokens.DOTA_PauseScriptedDemo_Question: Would you like to continue watching?
